name: Flowers in the Sky
description:
Lily White takes to the winter skies to begin the announcement of Spring!

Made for Touhou Fan Game Jam 7, https://itch.io/jam/touhou-jam-7  the theme being Touhou Song Titles, creating your game using one or more names of Touhou songs as your theme.

The game is an ode to Perfect Cherry Blossom stage 4 made on a danmaku system hacked together in Unity by myself.

Arrow keys to Move, Z to shoot, Shift to focus,  X when it lets you press X

No Life Count, simply a resource meter you fill by collecting pickups and lose half of it upon taking a miss.

Artist: Ferdy  @FerdysLab9

Composer: ssbbmaster Youtube.com/c/ssbbmaster
